title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Parachuting In: How to get up to speed quickly
description: Tips for investigative reporters on how to quickly get up to speed on a story, including tips on finding a local newsroom partner, setting up a headquarters, being flexible, and following instincts.
